message.body: Hey Dana, I'm in the library until 9, I will call u tomorrow before I go to school, Friday is totally fine, I will just call for the deets. Thanks!

Okay. You can call after nine as well if you'd like. Whatever works best for you. And do you know about what time you'd call tomorrow? I have class from 10:30 to 1:30 tomorrow. And I'm glad to hear Friday will work!
Okay sounds good!
Oh cool, I will give u a call about 930/10..talk to u then!
I'm done class, but I have other stuff from 2:30 to 5:15. Give me a call whenever you get a chance! I can also send you details via text if that's easier for you.
Hey, I have a lesson at 5 so if you can just text it would be great, I will get back at you with any questions..thanks!

Okay that works! I will pick Ella up from school tomorrow (at 3:19) and then we will walk back to penn's campus. The pennpal Halloween event is from four to six. There will be lots of activities and snacks as well as a chance to go trick-or-treating at so
I just wanted to confirm that I'm picking Ella up from school today! Let me know when and where you would like to pick her up after the event.
Yep, sounds good, she has Girl Scouts at 6:45 at st marys, so anywhere on locust walk is good
Okay sounds good! Do you think we could meet closer to 6?
Sure! See you then!
Yeah I can meet at six..on locust walk and 40?

Hi! Tell Ella I say happy birthday! Unfortunately this weekend is crazy, so I won't be able to do anything with Ella. However, we can celebrate the following weekend (the 17th or 18th) if that works on your end!
I hope Ella's birthday was fun! Is Ella free to do something this weekend?
She was sick on her actual birthday, but the weekend was good! We are free this weekend, either day
How does Sunday (11/18) at 2:00 sound?
Sure, sounds good, where should we meet?
Does 40th and locust work again? If not, I can be flexible!
Okay awesome!! See you then!
Sure!
Ok!
Heading over, fortieth and locust?
I'm waiting in car, let me know when you get there!
We'll be there in a few minutes! (Sorry we're running a bit late!)
No problem, see you soon : )
We're here!
There is a PennPal movie event next Friday (December 7th). Would Ella be interested in going?
Oh no, we are visiting her aunt who is in town from Maine that weekend
Rats! I could do something tomorrow around 12:30 if that works for you. Or I could do something with Ella after school on Thursday.
Lets go for tomorrow, we actually don't have anything planned for tomorrow. Where do you want to meet?
40th and locust? Or wherever!
Sure! See you there
Okay! I'm excited!
So is Ella!
It,s me ella I'm super exsiteid
Hi Ella!! I'm excited too! :)
Hi! Unfortunately things were too crazy with finals to see Ella, but I get back to Penn on January 9th (I think), and I will make sure to do something with Ella soon after! Have a great break!!
That is totally understandable, I hope finals went well! Enjoy your time off, see you in January
I hope you had a wonderful break! I know it's somewhat last minute, but is Ella available to do something on Tuesday after school?
Would you get her from school? Her dad picks her up on Tuesdays but I'm sure that would be fine
Yes. Unless something else works better for him.
Let me check with him and get back to you tomorrow, but I'm sure that would work
Okay sounds good! Thanks.
Did you have a chance to talk with Ella's dad about tomorrow yet?
Have fun, Ella is really excited to see u
Okay sounds good! I'm excited to see her too!
Hi! Sorry for the late notice (it's been a really busy week..), but would Ella be able to do something at some point tomorrow?
Sure! What time?
Oh no, I have my days mixed up, tomorrow and Sunday are no good. When is the next time that works?
Um I might be able to do Monday but I have to wait to hear about when a program starts before I will know for sure.

Sorry for not getting back to you sooner. I never heard back from the group I was waiting to hear from, so I assume the program is not starting this week. So, I would still be able to do something today, if that works on your end. But I totally understand
Lets go for this weekend, because Ella will be with her babysitter today, so I don't want to confuse her. But as far as we are concerned, Sunday is really good
I think Sunday work for me too! I'll text you later in the week to decide on a time.
Hi! Sorry for not getting back to you earlier! Does Sunday still work on your end?
Yes, Sunday is fine and Ella is looking forward to it. What time is good for you?
How does 1 sound?
Sure! See you at locust walk
Okay!!
I'm reading in my car, so just text when you guys are near
Okay. We're running a bit late (as usual) haha. But we'll be there soon!
No problem!
We're here!
I know this is super last minute (sorry!), but can Ella do something tomorrow at 10:30?
I'm sorry, she went to see a play with her grandmother today and is sleeping over. This week?
As far as I know, I can't this week. And then the following week is our spring break so I won't be in Philly. But if my schedule opens up, I will let you know. Sorry!
I know it's super last minute, but would Ella be able to do something after school tomorrow?
I think so..would you get her from school?
Yes.
Ok, let me just check with her dad, he normally gets her Tuesdays, I'm sure it will be fine tho
Okay thank you!
What time should I tell him he would meet you?
Around 5:15 would be best.
He says that fine, he will meet you at locust walk
Have fun!
Okay thanks!
Bad news, Ella's dad had to get a babysitter because he won't be in town till late tomorrow, can you guys get together another day?
I can probably do Saturday. I'll let you know later in the week what time will work best.
We will be away this weekend, so we can't do it Friday, Saturday or Sunday. Sorry to cancel : (
I have class until late on both Wednesday and Thursday. :( sorry! I'll try again next week! I'm pretty sure the weekend of the 23rd will work.
Hi! Are you and Ella doing anything for spring break next week?
She's actually going to her grandmothers house for part of the week, because I am not on spring break
Okay! Would she be able to do something on Monday?
Hi! I just wanted to check and see if and when Ella can do something this week. Tomorrow around 2 works best for me, but I can be flexible if need be.

Hi, I just wanted to make sure everything is okay on your end. Also, many Penn students and their pals are going to see Robin Hood on Saturday. It is at 1 on Penn's campus. (I think I can still get tickets!) Let me know if Ella would be interested! If n
Hey! Sorry, I was just thinking of you. That sounds fun, I think she would like to go to that. If not, I'm sure she would love to hang out Saturday in any other capacity.
No problem! I'll see if I can get tickets, but if not I'll find something else fun for us to do! Can we meet at 12:30 on Saturday regardless?
Okay see you then!
Sure, sounds good!
I'm running a minute late! I'll be right there. Sorry!
No problem
How does 3:45 sound?
Sounds good!
Hi! Sorry for the super late minute notice. But does tomorrow work on your end?
Sure that could work, what time?
How does 3 sound?
Sure, see you then!
Okay! I'm excited!
Be there in five!
Okay see you soon!
The zoo trip is scheduled for 11:30 on Saturday. Does that work for you?
Oh no, we are seeing Pinocchio at the Arden theater at eleven that day : (
Oh no! That's okay. Pinocchio should be fun! Ella and I can do something else. No worries!
Ok, do you still want to meet later that day, or another day?

I think another day would work better. Monday and Tuesday are our last day of classes, so I have a lot of exams. I was thinking maybe Wednesday, but I have to check and make sure nothing else is going on.
Ok just let us know. Good luck with exams!
Will do! And thanks!
Hi! Sorry for being so last minute again, but does tomorrow work on your end? I was thinking I could get Ella from school.
Normally she goes with a baby sitter until 6:30, would you be able to hang with her that long?
I have to interview people starting at 5..
I just want to confirm that I'm not picking up Ella from school, right?
Oh yes, sorry, I don't get out before five so I need to have her go home w the babysitter.
Does tomorrow work?
Okay that's fine. Unfortunately tomorrow and Friday don't work. But how does Saturday sound?
We will be out of town for the weekend unfortunately, next week?
Okay. Um.. I have a final on Tuesday. So I can do Tuesday or Wednesday!
How bout Wednesday next week?
Okay that works!
Awesome! Ella will be stoked.
Good! I'm excited too!
Yea I can do that!!
Hey, Ella has a half day Wednesday, would you be able to pick her up from school at 12:20 instead?
Hey Dana, sorry everything is mixed up, can we go back to 3:30 for tomorrow? Ella and her dad can meet you at locust walk
Haha sure that works!
Awesome, thanks!

Hi! I just wanted to let you know what the story is now that the semester is ending. (I apologize in advance that this is a bit long..) My last final is on Monday, so Wednesday was the last time I'm going to see Ella this semester. (I gave Ella a DVD w
That sounds great!! Ella really likes hanging out with you. We will def be in touch when we are back from Maine. Wow, Spain! That's awesome! See you this summer!
